import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Header = () => { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); const [activeLink, setActiveLink] = useState("Home"); const handleLinkClick = (link) => { setActiveLink(link); setIsOpen(false); // Close the mobile menu when a link is clicked }; return (

KT
{["Home", "About Me", "Portfolio", "Skills","Contact"].map((link) => ( handleLinkClick(link)} className={`px-3 py-2 mx-3 mt-2 transition-colors duration-300 transform rounded-md md:mt-0 ${ activeLink === link ? "text-primaryC" : "text-gray-700 hover:text-primaryC" }`} > {link} ))}
); }; export default Header;
